attributes.action: Set up a body where all GB residents can cotribute to all UK people in distress
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all want to help each other, and recognise need. Some have money. Some have goods. Mobilise the transport system to use spare lorry space to take useful and required goods to Cumbria and other areas of need when required.A nationwide co-op of love and compassion. Suggested by Labour. A legacy of Gordon Brown!
